about_the_game:
In DreadRun, the game kicks off with the Exploration Phase, where you explore the island , gathering valuable items to gear up for what’s ahead. This phase sets the stage for the Payload Phase, the bullet hell action of the game, where you face a fast-paced, action-packed challenge, navigating through a horde of bullets, while trying to escort a payload till the end, to emerge victorious.



In the Exploration Phase of DreadRun, your goal is to quickly gather a variety of potions, superior weapon, and upgrades before time runs out. Your adventure leads you through numerous randomly located rooms on a vast island, with each session presenting new rooms and loot. The upgrades you come across are random each time, making every game a distinct and exciting challenge. Utilize every second as efficiently as possible so that you will be prepared for what's ahead



After gearing up in the Exploration Phase, the Payload Phase of DreadRun is where the intense bullet hell action unfolds. In this phase, you’re challenged with fighting off a swarm of enemies and simultaneously escorting the payload to its end goal. As you advance, you’ll encounter various enemy types that will try to block your path and make your mission tougher. It’s a thrilling test of your combat skills and strategy as you push through to the end.

The Team


This game is a college project made in less than 3 months by a team of passionate 6 developers, Avinash Prabhu, Somno, Hassan Abusalih, Dev Trivedi, Armaan Takyar and Armaan Sheikh

name: Dreadrun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: not required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Better to have

short_description: DreadRun is a top-down bullet hell with roguelike elements. Where you must explore and gather various forms of loot  such as guns, potions, and perks in a limited period of time in order to evade and shoot  hordes of various enemies  while escorting a payload to safety.
